title: Sign up for the New Moz Affiliate Program today! - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: Transform Your Marketing Game and Boost Your Income With the New Moz Affiliate Program Moz News | Marketing Industry By: Victoria Bitove Edited By: Jo Cameron October 15, 2024 Table of Contents Copied! By: Victoria Bitove Edited By: Jo Cameron October 15, 2024 Transform Your Marketing Game and Boost Your Income With the New Moz Affiliate Program Moz News | Marketing Industry Here at Moz, we’re always looking for ways to build our community of like-minded SEO enthusiasts who enjoy the constant challenge and evolution of the search marketing world. Between MozCon, our involvement in various SEO conferences and organizations such as Women in Tech, our large presence on social channels, and our collection of best-in-class content, we have partnerships across the industry.And now, we're excited to announce the launch of our new Moz Affiliate Program! If you're passionate about SEO and digital marketing and want to grow your business and diversify your revenue stream, this is your chance to partner with one of the leading SEO software companies.LEARN MORE Why team up with Moz? You’re already passionate about digital marketing and SEO, right? Now you can get rewarded for sharing the tools that make your life easier. As a Moz affiliate, you'll have the opportunity to promote our top-tier tools and earn competitive commissions on every sale you generate. You get to partner with the team that wrote the blog on SEO. What’s in it for you? Earn Commission: Share the value of the Moz tools and earn up to $150 every time a customer signs up for Moz Pro through your unique referral link.Trust Factor: Your audience already knows you offer value, partner that with Moz’s reputation, and you’ve got a combination that converts and lends instant credibility.Marketing Resources: Gain access to exclusive content, banners, and promotional materials to help you effectively market Moz.Dedicated Support: Our dedicated affiliate team, All Inclusive Marketing, is here to assist you every step of the way, ensuring a seamless experience.About our affiliate partner AIMAll Inclusive Marketing (AIM), is Moz’s trusted partner managing this program. Founded in 2009, AIM has built a stellar reputation for its focus on thought leadership, performance excellence, personal connection, and world-class expertise. AIM not only takes care of its clients but also builds meaningful, lasting relationships with every partner they work with. With AIM managing this referral program on the Impact network, you can expect a smooth, high-performance experience every step of the way. Who can join? Are you... A blogger with a knack for all things SEO and digital marketing?An agency or freelance consultant who wants to grow their brand?A marketing content creator who lives for those engagement metrics?An SEO wizard who can build and execute your marketing strategy from keywords to conversion?Or a content marketer with an audience hungry for SEO success?If you nodded 'yes' to any of these, we want YOU on our team!Anyone can apply to the Moz Affiliate Program. As a company that specializes in SEO tools, having experience in the field will help you be more successful but whether you're a blogger, content creator, digital marketer, or SEO expert, if you have an audience interested in improving their SEO skills, we want you on board! How to get started Joining the Moz Affiliate Program is easy! Simply sign up on our affiliate portal, and once approved, you can start promoting right away. Step 1: Sign up to the Moz program through the affiliate dashboard on Impact.comStep 2: Go through the easy to use onboarding process and download banners, logos and other promotional materials to equip you with assets you need to promote. Step 3: Make sure you review the affiliate terms and conditions so you can abide by the right rules needed to succeed.Step 4: Get started! Promote on your website, blog, social media or any other networks you think will help to drive affiliate traffic! SIGN UP NOW For more details, visit our Affiliate Program page and sign up today. We can't wait to see what we can achieve together! Copied! Back to Top
